963880.name: 東方時空機行 ～ Iris Machina's Journey
963880.description:
One day, Nitori was doing research on new inventions just like she always did.

But just then, she received a report from a fellow kappa. She'd witnessed the appearance of some strange machines. "What kind of machines were they, then? Huh? Flying ones? Oh, well, now I HAVE to see them for myself!"

And thus began Nitori's journey to figure out what these machines were.

This game is a Touhou Project fangame. It's a shooting game where you defeat bosses while dodging danmaku.

Customize your weaponry to one of 576 possible combinations, and overcome the danmaku coming your way!
